title: Seraphim
description: Wyatt is a schizophrenic firefighter from New Jersey. Gabriel is the quick-witted, bisexual Messenger of God. Together with their siblings and Earth's first vampire, they must defeat the most twisted and depraved demon the world has ever known before she closes the gate between Heaven and Earth, enslaving humanity and slaughtering millions. "Like if Dean Winchester and Buffy had a baby and it grew up a little slutty."
author: Leslie Swartz
